item.title: My Books
item.description: Online Resources Topics in Statistical Consulting - coauthored with SCSRU at University of Waterloo. A First Course in Statistics - written based on my lecture notes for AFM 113, Spring 2022 at University of Waterloo.

item.title: My Recommendations

(2012). Design and analysis of experiments. John Wiley & Sons Ltd. Atkinson, A., Donev, A., & Tobias, R. (2007). Optimum experimental designs, with SAS. OUP Oxford. McCulloch, C. E., & Searle, S. R. (2004). Generalized, linear, and mixed models. John Wiley & Sons. Seber, G.
